availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin Caroll Bugg (Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Hickman County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary M.C. Allison Bugg in Hickman County, Kentucky, on September 28, 1854. Father of Robert J. Bugg. Farmer in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Spring Hill, p. 565.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, X County, City/District, p. 488A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994039, Hickman County Marriages.
"B C Bugg (1829-1890)," Find A Grave, Memorial 44574357 , accessed January 17, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/44574357 .
